def: To return one charge or accusation with another; to chargebackfault or crime upon an accuser.It is not my business to recriminate, hoping sufficiently toBp.Stillingfleet.
That part of medicine which treats of regimen for old people.
Of the form of a pear.
Of or pertaining to the Berycidæ, a family of marine fishes.
The art or practice of using the radiophone.
Bearing or having feet or legs.
Any species of the genus Manis, or family Manidæ.
